content: a much more accurate feel for any adjustments that can be made i suggest altering the number of row in c1 before beginning the toe if you find you need longer/shorter socks abbreviations mm- main marker k2tog- knit two together k- knit ssk- slip slip knit decrease slip two p- purl stitches knit-wise pass the 2 stitches tbl- through the back loop back to the right hand needle and st s - stitch es knit the two together cuff with smaller needles and c1 cast on 64 72 80 sts place mm and join in the round being careful not to twist your stitches *p1 k3tbl* to mm repeat for a total of 12 rounds of ribbing switch to larger needles knit 1 round with c2 work chart a 8 9 10 times around written instruction for all color work charts can be found on the last page of this pattern afterthought heel placement knit 1 round with c1 then knit another ¾ round 48 54 60 sts knit the next 32 36 40 sts with waste yarn return the 32 36 40 sts you just worked to the right hand needle and switch back to using c1 to knit the heel stitches a second time knit the remaining 48 54 60 sts in the round with c1 ending at mm your heel stitches should be the first and last quarter of your round foot knit 5 6 7 rounds with c2 knit 2 row with c1 the after-thought heel and toe are offset from the beginning work chart b 8 9 10 times around of the round to keep the jog from the color work on the knit 4 5 6 rounds with c2 back of your sock that s why you are knitting part-way knit 6 rounds with c1 through a round when placing these sections work the chart c 8 9 10 times around knit 6 rounds with c1 knit 14 15 16 rounds with c3 knit 10 11 12 rounds with c1 all following rounds will be worked with c1 toe remove mm knit 16 18 20 sts place mm i suggest placing another marker half way through the round as well to make the toe decreases easier round 1- knit all round 2- k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before before the halfway point of the round k2tog k2 ssk knit to 3 sts before mm k2tog k1 repeat row 1 and 2 until 24 sts remain break yarn leaving a tail approximately 15 long graft toe closed using the kitchener stitch heel remove waste yarn and place 32 36 40 sts on smaller needles pick up 2 additional sts from the gusset place the remaining 32 36 40 sts on needles pick up 1 st from the heel gusset pmm and pick up a second st from the gusset slip stitches as needed without knitting to return to mm 70 76 84 sts now on needles *k-tbl twice k30 34 38 sts k-tbl twice*
